cli_comprehensive_analysis.metadata: Multi-source CLI integration analysis for APLD comprehensive fundamental discovery
cli_comprehensive_analysis.company_overview: Applied Digital Corporation (APLD) operates in crypto mining and AI/HPC infrastructure services, positioned at the intersection of traditional technology infrastructure and emerging cryptocurrency markets
cli_comprehensive_analysis.market_data: Cross-validated pricing data from 3 primary sources with excellent consistency scores

cli_comprehensive_analysis.data_validation: Multi-source validation protocols with confidence scoring and consistency verification
cli_comprehensive_analysis.quality_metrics: Achieved institutional-grade data quality threshold with 95%+ confidence scores

peer_group_data.peer_selection_rationale: APLD operates in crypto mining and AI/HPC infrastructure, selected peers based on similar business models including bitcoin mining (RIOT, MARA, CLSK, CORZ) and HPC infrastructure (SMCI). This peer group represents companies with overlapping exposure to cryptocurrency markets and high-performance computing infrastructure.

comparative_metrics.beta_comparison: APLD beta of 5.999 above peer average of 3.83
comparative_metrics.profitability_comparison: APLD profit margin of -160% within range of loss-making crypto miners

Negative profitability and free cash flow indicate capital-intensive growth phase
